name: James Luberda
body: Recently compiled Perl 4.036 on my Tadpole/IBM N40 laptop running AIX 3.2.5. It's an interesting machine. If you're not familiar, [this](https://books.google.com/books?id=i9Cu5oVMHRwC&pg=PA29&lpg=PA29&dq=aix+tadpole+computerworld&source=bl&sa=X#v=onepage&q=aix%20tadpole%20computerworld&f=false) makes for an interesting introduction, dating from its announcement in 1994.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
